title: Controversial Internet Personality
summary: Andrew Tate speaks with a distinctive transatlantic accent (mix of American and British), characterized by confident, declarative statements, forceful emphasis on key words, and a melodic rise and fall pattern when making provocative points.
bio: Andrew Tate is a British-American internet personality, former professional kickboxer, and businessman. Known for his controversial views and luxury lifestyle content, Tate gained significant attention through podcast appearances and social media before facing legal issues and platform bans.

samples.title: Success Mindset
samples.description: Typical monologue about success and masculinity
samples.fullText: Listen. Most men are completely lost in the matrix. They're broke, they're weak, and they're slaves to the system. I live a life most can only dream of because I understand a simple truth: the modern world is designed to keep you poor and distracted. To escape, you need discipline, focus, and a complete rejection of excuses.
